body_html: I have a similar error trying to build a Docker image on Windows. The problem was in line endings, which was automatically converted from LF to CRLF by Git. I have set a global option git config --global core.eol lf and cloned the pytorch project again and the problem was solved.
body_text: I have a similar error trying to build a Docker image on Windows. The problem was in line endings, which was automatically converted from LF to CRLF by Git. I have set a global option git config --global core.eol lf and cloned the pytorch project again and the problem was solved.
body: I have a similar error trying to build a Docker image on Windows. The problem was in line endings, which was automatically converted from LF to CRLF by Git. I have set a global option `git config --global core.eol lf` and cloned the pytorch project again and the problem was solved.
